    • Constructor Detail

      • Cookbook

        public Cookbook(long isbn,
                java.lang.String callnum,
                int available,
                int total,
                java.lang.String title,
                java.lang.String publisher,
                char diet)
        Constructor for Cookbook objects. Contains the superclass attributes as well as two more, publisher and diet.
        Parameters:
        isbn - Holds value for ISBN.
        callnum - Holds the value of the call number.
        available - Holds the books available.
        total - Holds the total amount of books.
        title - Holds the title of the book.
        publisher - Holds the name of the publishers of the book.
        diet - Holds the type of diet the books are for.
